oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Conservation biological control of codling moth, Cydia pomonella
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Sigsgaard, Lene
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Crop combinations and interactions
Biodiversity and ecosystem services
Fruit and berries
Crop health, quality, protection
Landscape and recreation
Environmental aspects
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Ecological infrastructures in apple orchards may reduce post infestation by improving conditions for natural enemies.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Sigsgaard, Lene (2014) Conservation biological control of codling moth, Cydia pomonella. In: Landscape Management for Functional Biodiversity. IOBC-WPRS Bulletin, 100, pp. 123-126.
